Name: Brooklyn (Grohusko's original)
Ingredients: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Despite the generous dose of Italian 'sweet' vermouth, rye whiskey shines in this harmonious Sweet Manhattan -like dry cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Jacob. A. Grohusko's 1908 Jack's Manual .
Nutrition: One serving of Brooklyn (Grohusko's original) contains 198 calories
